Description.Text: Yellow Unlimited Hotel is a friendly 3-star property offering comfortable accommodation in the heart of Kharkiv. It boasts free Wi-Fi and an excellent location close to Pokrovsky Cathedral. Kharkiv is the second largest city in Ukraine and boasts diverse architecture, beautiful parks and large public squares. Nearby places of interest include Freedom Square, the 17th-century Pokrovsky Cathedral, The Assumption Cathedral, Karkov Botanical Garden and Sumska street. Istorychnyi Muzei metro station is located in the vicinity, providing fast and easy access to other popular Kharkiv destinations. The hotel is housed in a modern mid-rise building with a colourful facade. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the premises. Standard rooms are 20sqm and decorated in a simple style with carpeted floors. They feature a sitting area with a table and two chairs, a spacious wardrobe and a small window. Amenities include air-conditioning, cable TV and a kettle. The en-suite bathrooms feature a bathtub with integrated shower. Guests can enjoy a range of drinks at the hotel bar. There are plenty of dining opportunities in the vicinity. The hotel has a 24-hour reception. Chargeable parking is possible nearby.
